meanings.definition: Resembling a wisp in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The wispish clouds floated gently across the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her wispish hair framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The wispish cat stealthily crept up to the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His wispish figure seemed to blend into the misty morning fog.
meanings.sent5: The wispish dancer moved gracefully on stage, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: Thin and delicate in form or texture.
meanings.sent1: The delicate flower had a wispish stem that swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She wore a wispish scarf that fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The wispish fabric of the dress felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent4: His wispish fingers carefully handled the fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The wispish strands of spider silk shimmered in the sunlight.
